Package dvr

Class SolverACO

java.lang.Object
dvr.SolverACO
All Implemented Interfaces:
Solver
public class SolverACO extends Object implements Solver
A solver which uses Ant Colony Optimisation (ACO) to find routes.

    • SolverACO

      public SolverACO(DistanceMatrix d, int[] vehicleCapacity)
      Solver constructor.
      Parameters:
      d - Distance matrix used to initialise the solver.
      vehicleCapacity - Capacity of each delivery vehicle. List length dictates the number of vehicles.

    • run

      public Route[] run()
      Calculate and return a route. The returned route may not initially be optimal but should get better each run.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Solver
      Returns:
      One or more routes.

      Calculate and return a route. The returned route may not initially be optimal but should get better each run.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Solver
      Parameters:
      iterations - Number of attempts to find a better route.

      Get the average distance travelled by the calculated routes.

    • increase

      public void increase(Route[] route, float amount)
      Use a route list to increase usage values on a certain path by a certain amount.
      Parameters:
      route - The list of routes which defines the path.
      amount - The amount to increase each value along the length of the path.

    • size

      Get the size of the usage matrix in one dimension.

    • getMaxUsage

      public float getMaxUsage(int locationA, int locationB)
      Get the usage value (pheromone level) between two locations.
      Parameters:
      locationA - The index of location-A within the location list.
      locationB - The index of location-B within the location list.
      Returns:
      A measure of the amount of traffic moving from location-A to location-B.

    • getMaxUsage

      public float getMaxUsage()
      Get the highest usage value contained within the matrix.
      Returns:
      The highest single usage value.
